name: Domination
victoryScreenHeader: Capture all enemy Capitals to win!

name: Assimilation
victoryScreenHeader: Assimilate all life on the map to win.
victoryString: The Flood have consumed everything...can they truly still be stopped?
defeatString: The Flood have devoured what exists of your race here. There is nothing more to be said--the abomination leaves you no further time to ponder.

name: Containment
victoryScreenHeader: Regain control of the Shield World to win.

name: Time
milestones: Have highest score after max turns
victoryString: The world has been convulsed by war. Many great and powerful civilizations have fallen, but you have survived - and emerged victorious! The world will long remember your glorious triumph!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!
